column5: This is an older Argosy Trailer made by Airstream, it has a full bed and a twin bed. The shower does not work, however there are showers and a full bath in a separate utility building (communal) 10 feet away, along with a community outdoor kitchen. The views are incredible! Also, we are happy to offer cooking facilities, we ask that you clean your pots, pans, and dishes after using them.
column8: Argosy Trailer in the Ghost Town
